name: Power Crystal Crisis
description:
A village's magic has disappeared. Control elves Meriel, Lianthorn, and Fyra as they explore the Power Crystal caves and win their magic back!

Features:

  • 3 nonlinear quests + 1 final dungeon
  • Custom actions sequences and animations
  • On-screen encounters - you can see your enemies coming at you

Made with RPG Maker MV default assets for the 5th Annual Driftwood Jam.
